name: AskPenfolds
0:
”Alexa, ask Penfolds”
”Alexa, Ask Penfolds about Grange”
”Alexa, Ask Penfolds about cellaring at home”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: penfolds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Penfolds is celebrated as one of Australia’s most famed and respected winemakers – an innovative wine brand driven by generations of visionaries and innovators to create an expansive portfolio of extraordinary wines known for their age-ability. In this skill you can:
 
• Discover Penfolds story
• Hear how Penfolds began
• Learn about Penfolds winemaking philosophy and House Style
• Discover the story behind Grange, one of the world’s most revered wines
• Gain an introduction to some of Penfolds most celebrated wines
• Discover tasting notes and drinking windows for specific Penfolds vintages, some reaching back more than 50 years.
• Discover food pairings that perfectly complement Penfolds wines and wine varietals
• Learn about ideal serving temperatures
• Hear a guide on how to decant red and white wines
• Hear tips on choosing the right glassware
• Learn how to enhance your drinking experience
• Discover how to start a home cellar
• Learn about ideal wine storage temperatures
• Discover the cellaring potential of Penfolds wines
• Explore the vineyards and wine-growing regions that contribute to Penfolds wines
• Hear how we care for our vineyards
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
